name: NIAID News
content:
NEWS: NIAID scientists further validate #RTQuIC test to diagnose #Parkinson‚Äôs disease. Spinal fluid sample yields result in 1-2 days with high accuracy.

A rapid Œ±‚Äêsynuclein seed assay of Parkinson‚Äôs disease CSF panel shows high diagnostic accuracy
Background Assays that specifically measure Œ±‚Äêsynuclein seeding activity in biological fluids could revolutionize the diagnosis of Parkinson‚Äôs disease. Recent improvements in Œ±‚Äêsynuclein real‚Äêtime...
onlinelibrary.wiley.com

name: NIAID News
content: NEJM paper details mRNA-1273 vaccine's 94.1% efficacy in preventing symptomatic COVID-19 when tested in Phase 3 clinical trial. Vaccine co-developed by Moderna and NIH also effective at preventing severe COVID-19. Study findings at: DOI: 10.1056/NEJMoa2035389 (2020).
text: NEJM paper details mRNA-1273 vaccine's 94.1% efficacy in preventing symptomatic COVID-19 when tested in Phase 3 clinical trial. Vaccine co-developed by Moderna and NIH also effective at preventing severe COVID-19. Study findings at: DOI: 10.1056/NEJMoa2035389 (2020).

name: NIAID News
content:
#ScienceHighlights2020 üî¨: This year, researchers made enormous strides in understanding, preventing & treating #COVID19. Other work brought scientific advances in #HIV, #tuberculosis, #eczema & many additional areas: http://bit.ly/2020NIAIDHighlights‚Ä¶

name: NIAID News
content: #Ebanga is the 1st product discovered and developed by NIAID‚Äôs Vaccine Research Center to receive @FDA license approval and builds upon tools and experience from HIV research. VRC integrates research, process development, manufacturing, clinical testing and sample evaluation.
text: #Ebanga is the 1st product discovered and developed by NIAID‚Äôs Vaccine Research Center to receive @FDA license approval and builds upon tools and experience from HIV research. VRC integrates research, process development, manufacturing, clinical testing and sample evaluation.

name: NIAID News
content: #Ebanga was licensed to Ridgeback Biotherapeutics in Dec. 2018. Ridgeback and @BARDA partnered in September 2019 for late-stage manufacturing and regulatory activities to support licensure. https://medicalcountermeasures.gov/newsroom/2020/ridgeback/‚Ä¶
text: #Ebanga was licensed to Ridgeback Biotherapeutics in Dec. 2018. Ridgeback and @BARDA partnered in September 2019 for late-stage manufacturing and regulatory activities to support licensure. https:// medicalcountermeasures.gov/newsroom/2020/ ridgeback/ ‚Ä¶

name: NIAID News
content: The #PALM trial ended early (in Aug 2019) due to data showing patients receiving #Ebanga or REGN-EB3 (Inmazeb) had a greater chance of surviving Ebola virus disease. The findings were confirmed in a Nov. 2019 publication https://niaid.nih.gov/news-events/investigational-drugs-reduce-risk-death-ebola-virus-disease‚Ä¶
text: The #PALM trial ended early (in Aug 2019) due to data showing patients receiving #Ebanga or REGN-EB3 (Inmazeb) had a greater chance of surviving Ebola virus disease. The findings were confirmed in a Nov. 2019 publication https:// niaid.nih.gov/news-events/in vestigational-drugs-reduce-risk-death-ebola-virus-disease ‚Ä¶

name: NIAID News
content: In Aug. 2018, the #DRC declared the country‚Äôs 10th outbreak of #EVD. In Nov. 2018, @inrb_kinshasa and #NIAID (with @WHO support) began a randomized, controlled trial of multiple investigational Ebola therapies, including #Ebanga, in the #DRC. https://niaid.nih.gov/news-events/clinical-trial-investigational-ebola-treatments-begins-democratic-republic-congo‚Ä¶
text: In Aug. 2018, the #DRC declared the country‚Äôs 10th outbreak of #EVD . In Nov. 2018, @inrb_kinshasa and #NIAID (with @WHO support) began a randomized, controlled trial of multiple investigational Ebola therapies, including #Ebanga , in the #DRC . https:// niaid.nih.gov/news-events/cl inical-trial-investigational-ebola-treatments-begins-democratic-republic-congo ‚Ä¶

name: NIAID News
content: In May 2018, NIAID (with @DARPA support) began enrolling healthy volunteers in a Phase 1 clinical trial of #Ebanga at the @NIHClinicalCntr. Results published in Jan. 2019 showed the therapy is safe, well-tolerated, and easy to administer. https://niaid.nih.gov/news-events/investigational-monoclonal-antibody-treat-ebola-safe-adults‚Ä¶
text: In May 2018, NIAID (with @DARPA support) began enrolling healthy volunteers in a Phase 1 clinical trial of #Ebanga at the @NIHClinicalCntr . Results published in Jan. 2019 showed the therapy is safe, well-tolerated, and easy to administer. https:// niaid.nih.gov/news-events/in vestigational-monoclonal-antibody-treat-ebola-safe-adults ‚Ä¶

name: NIAID News
content: Together with @MTamfum, @inrb_kinshasa & the Institute for Research in Biomedicine (Switzerland), Dr. Nancy Sullivan & her team at NIAID‚Äôs VRC isolated #Ebanga from a survivor of the 1995 Kikwit Ebola outbreak. Preclinical studies showed promise: https://niaid.nih.gov/news-events/experimental-ebola-antibody-protects-monkeys‚Ä¶
text: Together with @MTamfum , @inrb_kinshasa & the Institute for Research in Biomedicine (Switzerland), Dr. Nancy Sullivan & her team at NIAID‚Äôs VRC isolated #Ebanga from a survivor of the 1995 Kikwit Ebola outbreak. Preclinical studies showed promise: https:// niaid.nih.gov/news-events/ex perimental-ebola-antibody-protects-monkeys ‚Ä¶

name: NIAID News
content: A longstanding research partnership between #NIAID scientists and their collaborators in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (#DRC) made this significant achievement possible.
text: A longstanding research partnership between #NIAID scientists and their collaborators in the Democratic Republic of the Congo ( #DRC ) made this significant achievement possible.

name: NIAID News
content:
#EBOLA NEWS: Last week, @FDA approved a single human monoclonal antibody now known as #Ebanga (Ansuvimab-zykl, #mAb114), for the treatment for Zaire ebolavirus (Ebolavirus) infection in adults and children.

FDA Approves Treatment for Ebola Virus
The FDA approved Ebanga (Ansuvimab-zykl), a human monoclonal antibody, for the treatment for Zaire ebolavirus (Ebolavirus) infection in adults and children.
fda.gov
text: #EBOLA NEWS: Last week, @FDA approved a single human monoclonal antibody now known as #Ebanga (Ansuvimab-zykl, #mAb114 ), for the treatment for Zaire ebolavirus (Ebolavirus) infection in adults and children. FDA Approves Treatment for Ebola Virus The FDA approved Ebanga (Ansuvimab-zykl), a human monoclonal antibody, for the treatment for Zaire ebolavirus (Ebolavirus) infection in adults and children. fda.gov

name: NIH
text: NIH (@NIH) News: Phase 3 trial of Novavax investigational COVID-19 vaccine opens Phase 3 trial of Novavax investigational COVID-19 vaccine opens NIH- and BARDA-funded trial will enroll up to 30,000 volunteers. nih.gov

name: NIAID News
content: COVID-19 NEWS: now published in @NEJM: results of a clinical trial testing LY-CoV555 in hospitalized #COVID19 patients showed that it did not provide clinical benefit compared to placebo in that patient population. http://bit.ly/38wv2Je
text: COVID-19 NEWS: now published in @NEJM : results of a clinical trial testing LY-CoV555 in hospitalized #COVID19 patients showed that it did not provide clinical benefit compared to placebo in that patient population. http:// bit.ly/38wv2Je

content:

name: NIAID News
content: .@NIAIDNews scientists demonstrate deep phenotyping of human tissues using IBEX and commercially available antibodies by visualizing #immune interactions in a mesenteric #LymphNode with #GerminalCenters:
text: . @NIAIDNews scientists demonstrate deep phenotyping of human tissues using IBEX and commercially available antibodies by visualizing #immune interactions in a mesenteric #LymphNode with #GerminalCenters :

name: NIAID News
content: IBEX can be applied to capture ultra-high content data from human tissues, as @NIAIDNews scientists demonstrate by visualizing #tumor-#immune interactions in a pancreatic #LymphNode with #metastatic lesions:
text: IBEX can be applied to capture ultra-high content data from human tissues, as @NIAIDNews scientists demonstrate by visualizing #tumor - #immune interactions in a pancreatic #LymphNode with #metastatic lesions:

name: NIAID News
content: NEWS: @NIAIDNews researchers have developed a new #OpenSource method for highly #multiplex tissue imaging, called IBEX, that can be integrated into most current lab workflows. Read more in @PNASNews: http://bit.ly/IBEX-PNAS
text: NEWS: @NIAIDNews researchers have developed a new #OpenSource method for highly #multiplex tissue imaging, called IBEX, that can be integrated into most current lab workflows. Read more in @PNASNews : http:// bit.ly/IBEX-PNAS

name: Secretary Alex Azar
content:
Secretary Alex Azar (@SecAzar)
Tomorrow I'll receive my COVID-19 vaccine @NIH alongside @NIHDirector, @NIAIDNews Dr. Fauci, & several @NIHClinicalCntr frontline workers.

We believe it's important to publicly receive the vaccine as part of our efforts to demonstrate that these vaccines are safe and effective.
text: Secretary Alex Azar (@SecAzar) Tomorrow I'll receive my COVID-19 vaccine @NIH alongside @NIHDirector , @NIAIDNews Dr. Fauci, & several @NIHClinicalCntr frontline workers. We believe it's important to publicly receive the vaccine as part of our efforts to demonstrate that these vaccines are safe and effective.

name: Francis S. Collins
content:
Francis S. Collins (@NIHDirector)
I will receive @moderna_tx #COVID19 vaccine alongside @SecAzar, @NIAIDNews Dr. Fauci, and several @NIHClinicalCntr frontline workers as part of an NIH vaccine kick-off event tomorrow @10amET. We at #NIH are proud to have taken part in an amazing journey that will save many lives.
text: Francis S. Collins (@NIHDirector) I will receive @moderna_tx #COVID19 vaccine alongside @SecAzar , @NIAIDNews Dr. Fauci, and several @NIHClinicalCntr frontline workers as part of an NIH vaccine kick-off event tomorrow @10amET . We at #NIH are proud to have taken part in an amazing journey that will save many lives.

name: NIAID News
content: NIAID Director, Dr. Anthony Fauci will be rolling up his sleeve tomorrow to get @moderna_tx #COVID19 vaccine alongside @SecAzar, @NIHDirector, and several @NIHClinicalCntr frontline workers to build confidence in the vaccine, which is the best hope against this pandemic.
text: NIAID Director, Dr. Anthony Fauci will be rolling up his sleeve tomorrow to get @moderna_tx #COVID19 vaccine alongside @SecAzar , @NIHDirector , and several @NIHClinicalCntr frontline workers to build confidence in the vaccine, which is the best hope against this pandemic.

name: NIAID News
content: NEWS: NIAID scientists suggest #Reston #ebolavirus be considered a livestock pathogen with potential to affect other mammals, including people, based on a new study of pigs. https://bit.ly/3h7SEHM
text: NEWS: NIAID scientists suggest #Reston #ebolavirus be considered a livestock pathogen with potential to affect other mammals, including people, based on a new study of pigs. https:// bit.ly/3h7SEHM

name: NIH
content:
NIH (@NIH)
Today @US_FDA granted Emergency Use Authorization to @moderna_tx for #COVID19 vaccine mRNA-1273. We are proud of the work by scientists at #NIH's @NIAIDnews who co-developed this urgently needed vaccine. http://bit.ly/38oqHb4
text: NIH (@NIH) Today @US_FDA granted Emergency Use Authorization to @moderna_tx for #COVID19 vaccine mRNA-1273. We are proud of the work by scientists at #NIH 's @NIAIDnews who co-developed this urgently needed vaccine. http:// bit.ly/38oqHb4

name: NIAID News
content: COVID-19 NEWS: Today, two Phase 3 trials to test potential therapeutics for #COVID19 began enrolling participants. The two trials, part of the ACTIV-3 master protocol, will test monoclonal #antibody therapeutics in hospitalized participants. http://bit.ly/ACTIV3-GSK-VIR-Brii‚Ä¶
text: COVID-19 NEWS: Today, two Phase 3 trials to test potential therapeutics for #COVID19 began enrolling participants. The two trials, part of the ACTIV-3 master protocol, will test monoclonal #antibody therapeutics in hospitalized participants. http:// bit.ly/ACTIV3-GSK-VIR -Brii ‚Ä¶

name: NIH Common Fund
content:
NIH Common Fund (@NIH_CommonFund)
Heard about our Cellular Senescence Network (#SenNet) program? It aims to identify & characterize senescent cells (which no longer replicate) across the body & develop technology for studying #senescence. Read more on the #NIHCommonFund site: http://go.usa.gov/x7Vrn
text: NIH Common Fund (@NIH_CommonFund) Heard about our Cellular Senescence Network ( #SenNet ) program? It aims to identify & characterize senescent cells (which no longer replicate) across the body & develop technology for studying #senescence . Read more on the #NIHCommonFund site: http:// go.usa.gov/x7Vrn

name: NIAID News
content: #COVID19 NEWS: @NIAIDNews has launched a study to evaluate short- and long-term health outcomes of #SARSCoV2 infection in #children, including MIS-C, and to characterize immunologic pathways associated with different disease presentations and outcomes. http://bit.ly/SARSCoV2inKids
text: #COVID19 NEWS: @NIAIDNews has launched a study to evaluate short- and long-term health outcomes of #SARSCoV2 infection in #children , including MIS-C, and to characterize immunologic pathways associated with different disease presentations and outcomes. http:// bit.ly/SARSCoV2inKids

name: NIH
content:
NIH (@NIH)
Join us live on 12/15 at 2pm ET for a chat with @NIAIDNews Director Dr. Anthony Fauci & #NIH Tribal Health Research Office Director Dr. David Wilson about the importance of #COVID19 research, clinical trials & vaccines within the #AIAN community.
text: NIH (@NIH) Join us live on 12/15 at 2pm ET for a chat with @NIAIDNews Director Dr. Anthony Fauci & #NIH Tribal Health Research Office Director Dr. David Wilson about the importance of #COVID19 research, clinical trials & vaccines within the #AIAN community.

name: NIAID News
content: COVID-19 NEWS: Today, a #NIAID study of #baricitinib and #remdesivir for people hospitalized with #COVID19 published in @NEJM. Participants who received the combination did better than those who received remdesivir alone. http://bit.ly/ACTT2NEJM
text: COVID-19 NEWS: Today, a #NIAID study of #baricitinib and #remdesivir for people hospitalized with #COVID19 published in @NEJM . Participants who received the combination did better than those who received remdesivir alone. http:// bit.ly/ACTT2NEJM

name: NIAID News
content: Natural infection with SARS-CoV-2 does not always lead to durable immunity to the virus. These results suggest that the mRNA-1273 vaccine could provide long-term protection.
text: Natural infection with SARS-CoV-2 does not always lead to durable immunity to the virus. These results suggest that the mRNA-1273 vaccine could provide long-term protection.

name: NIAID News
content: Participants had sustained, elevated levels of #antibodies against the virus which causes #COVID19, despite some decline in antibody titers over time. This suggests that the vaccine could provide durable humoral immunity against the virus.
text: Participants had sustained, elevated levels of #antibodies against the virus which causes #COVID19 , despite some decline in antibody titers over time. This suggests that the vaccine could provide durable humoral immunity against the virus.

name: NIAID News
content: The study tracked participants for 119 days after receiving their first dose of the vaccine; three months after the second dose. Blood tests were used to track the levels of antibodies against SARS-CoV-2, the virus which causes #COVID19, in their blood.
text: The study tracked participants for 119 days after receiving their first dose of the vaccine; three months after the second dose. Blood tests were used to track the levels of antibodies against SARS-CoV-2, the virus which causes #COVID19 , in their blood.

name: NIAID News
content:
COVID-19 NEWS: In a letter published in @NEJM today, researchers from #NIAID and partners describe the long-term immunogenicity results from a phase 1 trial of the mRNA-1273 #COVID19 #vaccine:

Durability of Responses after SARS-CoV-2 mRNA-1273 Vaccination | NEJM
Correspondence from The New England Journal of Medicine ‚Äî Durability of Responses after SARS-CoV-2 mRNA-1273 Vaccination
nejm.org
text: COVID-19 NEWS: In a letter published in @NEJM today, researchers from #NIAID and partners describe the long-term immunogenicity results from a phase 1 trial of the mRNA-1273 #COVID19 #vaccine : Durability of Responses after SARS-CoV-2 mRNA-1273 Vaccination | NEJM Correspondence from The New England Journal of Medicine ‚Äî Durability of Responses after SARS-CoV-2 mRNA-1273 Vaccination nejm.org

name: NIAID News
content: On #WorldAIDSDay, @NIH reflects on both the remarkable progress that has been made against #HIV & the considerable challenges that remain. Read a statement from @NIAIDNews Director Dr. Fauci & @NIH_OAR Director Dr. Goodenow: https://bit.ly/NIHWAD2020

name: NIAID News
content: #HIV NEWS: @NIAIDNews today announced the investigators & institutions that will lead 4 @NIH HIV #ClinicalTrials networks over the next 7 years. NIAID also awarded grants to 35 institutions selected as HIV clinical trials units. https://bit.ly/HIVnetworks
text: #HIV NEWS: @NIAIDNews today announced the investigators & institutions that will lead 4 @NIH HIV #ClinicalTrials networks over the next 7 years. NIAID also awarded grants to 35 institutions selected as HIV clinical trials units. https:// bit.ly/HIVnetworks

content: NEWS: An experimental vaccine developed in Europe to prevent infection by #Crimean Congo hemorrhagic fever virus has protected cynomolgus macaques in a new NIAID collaborative study. https://bit.ly/3o9F1dv
